## Lab

- A mix of new ideas, practice, and working on problem sets.

- Introduction and practice with Quarto authoring tools.

    + Quarto Publications (weekly)

- Every other week you take a quiz in lab.


## Assignment types

- 5% Quarto Publications (credit / no credit)

- 10% Problem Sets (credit / no credit): assortment of practice problems

- 15% Projects (credit / no credit): Explorations of real data and computing workflows

- 40% Quizzes: Every two weeks in lab

- 30% Final Exam: Monday of finals week 7 - 10 pm
